p: Here, we utilized rOC43-ns2DelRluc to study the timing of HCoV replication and dissemination in the CNS of mice and verified CQ as a CoV inhibitor in vivo by using non-invasive BLI in living mice. Our study provides new insights into CoV replication and dissemination in the CNS and offers a convenient and valuable method for identifying anti-HCoV drugs capable of treating neurological symptoms.
